visuals.svg: <svg viewBox='0 0 1080 1920'><defs><radialGradient id='bgGlow' cx='50%' cy='30%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#1a1240'/><stop offset='60%' stop-color='#0b0d17'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#05060b'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='bgLines' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#a955f7' stop-opacity='0.35'/><stop offset='60%' stop-color='#fadd46' stop-opacity='0.12'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#00d4ff' stop-opacity='0.10'/></linearGradient><pattern id='grid' width='90' height='90' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><path d='M90 0H0V90' fill='none' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-opacity='0.05' stroke-width='2'/></pattern></defs><rect width='1080' height='1920' fill='url(#bgGlow)'/><rect width='1080' height='1920' fill='url(#grid)'/><path d='M-80 240 C 140 60, 420 80, 700 260 S 1200 520, 1180 240' fill='none' stroke='url(#bgLines)' stroke-width='16' stroke-linecap='round' opacity='0.65'/><path d='M-120 620 C 180 420, 520 460, 860 680 S 1220 1020, 1160 760' fill='none' stroke='url(#bgLines)' stroke-width='10' stroke-linecap='round' opacity='0.45'/><circle cx='860' cy='420' r='160' fill='#a955f7' opacity='0.10'/><circle cx='220' cy='1180' r='220' fill='#fadd46' opacity='0.06'/><circle cx='900' cy='1500' r='260' fill='#00d4ff' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

<svg viewBox='0 0 880 620'>
  <defs>
